song_lyric:
作曲 : Enik Lin & 李玖哲Nicky Lee
 作词 : Enik Lin
中文歌词：陈建宇Jerry Chen
制作人Producer：Enik Lin & 李玖哲Nicky Lee
编曲Music Arranger：Enik Lin
录音Recording：Enik Lin at Fyke Studios, LA
混音Mixing：Enik Lin at Fyke Studios, LA
母带后期处理Mastering：Gene Grimaldi at Oasis Mastering
These years
These seconds
Stand still
When I'm with you
With fear
Defenseless
We spill without a moment to lose
Hold on tonight
We'll take these changing steps
Into the light
Oh hold on
I'm not leaving without you
If we all fall to pieces
If we all hit the ground
Know that I'll never leave us
I'll stay when no ones around
I'll stay
No words
No methods
Just will
To sit where you stand
So lost
I'm breathless
I feel the sweat in my hands
Hold on tonight
We'll take these changing steps
Into the light
Oh hold on
I'm not leaving without you
If we all fall to pieces
If we all hit the ground
Know that I'll never leave us
I'll stay when no ones around
Hold on tonight
We'll make on all the promises
Don't stop the fight
We're going to make it
We're going to make it
If we all fall to pieces
If we all hit the ground
Know that I'll never leave us
I'll stay when no ones around
I'll stay
I'll stay
I'll stay
